There are 18 different gems in Pokémon Unbound, each corresponding to one of the different Pokémon types in the game.

You can trade gems to acquire rare items like certain Mega Stones, or to teach your Pokemon certain moves via the Gem Family move tutors. You can even trade gems to a female NPC at Cube Corp to acquire Master Balls. Gems can also be used as held items in battle.

Acquiring Gems

There isn’t a lot of great documentation on every location of every gem, but the list below covers the best methods for farming gems:

  • Mining – Crystal Peak – You have a higher chance of getting gems while mining at Crystal Peak with the ADM in the post-game. Check out this list for every item you can acquire from Mining with percentage chances of each item.
  • Gurun Town Hard Stones NPC – You can farm Hard Stones and then trade 20 stones to a collector in Gurun Town to get any gem of your choosing. The easiest way to get Hard Stones is to farm Rock Smash outside the Great Desert.
  • Raids – Certain raids drop certain gems at higher percentage chances, so you can do daily raids for gems as well. We have a list of all raid dens with pages detailing all the drops for each one.

List of All Gems

The table below lists all of the gems in the game along with their in-game descriptions.
